Hello friends!

We are glad to welcome you to our channel! Here you will find high-quality retellings of your favorite anime. We try to make our videos interesting and informative so that you can learn more about your favorite stories.

What will you find on our channel?

Retellings of popular anime.
Interesting facts about anime and their characters.
Analysis of storylines and characters.
We make our videos several times a week so that you always have something to watch. Subscribe to our channel, like it and don't forget the bell to receive notifications about new videos.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to leave comments. We will be glad to hear your opinion.

Thank you for choosing our channel! We hope you enjoy watching our anime retellings. Enjoy watching!
